bitmap



BmpFileHeader

typedef struct {
  uint16 type;
  uint32 size;
  uint16 reserved1;
  uint16 reserved2;
  uint32 offset_bits;
} BmpFileHeader;
type: C struct

BmpInfoHeader

typedef struct {
  uint32 size;
  int32  width;
  int32  height;
  uint16 planes;
  uint16 bit_count;
  uint32 compression;
  uint32 size_image;
  int32  x_pixels_per_meter;
  int32  y_pixels_per_meter;
  uint32 colors_used;
  uint32 colors_important;
} BmpInfoHeader;
type: C struct
